content: of the round making sure you leave the 5 sts intact place sm to indicate sor or mark the first st with a safety pin or split ring marker k4 again you will have 5 live sts round 2 *k1 yo repeat from * until end of round 16 sts turn and k5 rounds 3-5 knit continue to turn and k5 until strap measures 29½ /75cm or round 6 *k1 yo repeat from * until end of round 32 sts desired length 29½ /75cm is a good length for an adult to sling over their rounds 7-11 knit shoulder or an older child to wear across their chest for a younger child or pre-schooler the strap will need to be the body about 4 to 6 /10 to 15 cm shorter change to us7/4 5mm needles the following two rounds form the pattern for the lace mesh finishing section using kitchener stitch graft the 5 sts to the 5 remaining sts on the other side of the bottle carrier round 1 *k2tog yo repeat from * until end of round make sure your sm is in place to indicate sor weave in ends round 2 knit alternative stocking handle rounds 1- 5 knit tip if you are magic looping make sure you check your stitch count regularly it is quite easy to lose those yarn overs next round cast off 11 sts k4 off the end of the needle this will give you 5 live sts beginning the cast-off process again cast-off another 11 sts repeat rounds 1 and 2 another 17 times each for a total of making sure you leave the 5 sts intact 18 repeats of the two lace mesh rounds k4 again you will have 5 live sts the handle note on yarn subbing slip 5 sts to us6/4mm dpn and work i-cord for 17¾ /45cm the recommended cotton lily sugar n cream is a very sturdy thick and robust cotton if you re subbing with another cast off cotton you may wish to shorten the length of the straps to account for the stretch that will occur with wear reattach yarn to remaining 5 sts and work in either stocking for lighter worsted weight cottons like the anchor style stitch or i-cord for 17¾ /45cm cast off magicline i would recommend working the alternative stocking strap finishing round 1 purl tie the straps together and weave in all ends round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 and 2 once more and then round 1 one more time www tikkiknits com au pattern is for
